name: Fragile (itch) (Felix Helixihare)
description:
A game in which you type words to destroy your enemies. Remember, WORDS are always displayed in all caps. Abilities and selection are also controlled through typing. Press enter to submit your WORDS. Do not be afraid to mistype. There is no penalty for misspelling. In fact, it might be faster to ENTER than to BACKSPACE.

Felix Helixihare
MrHytro
